channel.title: Changes to the MoparScape Server Status Checker?
channel.description:
[b]What to change?[/b] - When you go to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php it is sorted by date of registering & uptime. - So why not change it so when you enter that page it sorts on the vote count? - So people can see who has most votes and is most popular - Why? So people that have much votes actually get rewarded by being on the front page... - Otherwise the voting system fails, voting is to get more people, but when its not on the frontpage its useless.
[b]I know this is the wrong board, but didnt knew where to post it else.[/b]
[b]Regards,[/b] RuneMyth

item.title: Changes to the MoparScape Server Status Checker?
item.dc:creator: @RuneMyth RuneMyth
item.description:
@RuneMyth wrote:

Thats my point…
If noobs come to that page, they just look straight at those servers, but
that are just random servers without high votes…

It needs to sort it by votes immediately when entering that page!

item.title: Changes to the MoparScape Server Status Checker?
item.dc:creator: @RuneMyth RuneMyth
item.description:
@RuneMyth wrote:

What to change?

  • When you go to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
    it is sorted by date of registering & uptime.
  • So why not change it so when you enter that page it sorts on the vote count?
  • So people can see who has most votes and is most popular
  • Why? So people that have much votes actually get rewarded by being on the front page…
  • Otherwise the voting system fails, voting is to get more people, but when its not on the frontpage its useless.

I know this is the wrong board, but didnt knew where to post it else.

Regards,
RuneMyth

Read full topic
